channel.title: Go on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: Mac 安装go及换源
item.description: brew 安装 go 1 brew install go 设置 path 1 vim .zshrc 加入下述内容 1 2 3 # go export GOROOT=/usr/local/opt/go/libexec export PATH=$PATH:$GOROOT/bin 换源 1 vim .zshrc 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 # 配置 GOPROXY 环境变量，以下三选一 # 1. 七牛 CDN go env -w GOPROXY=https://goproxy.cn,direct # 2. 阿里云 go
